text_block_list.text:
One day, as I was walking through 
campus, I saw…

text_block_list.name: Rat?
text_block_list.text:
Squeak, squeak! 
Bakushin, Bakushin!

text_block_list.name: Cat?
text_block_list.text:
Meow, meow! 
Bakushin, Bakushin!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Negative!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It's the class president!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And, oh no――! 
They're coming!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
No, it's an impersonation!! 
To avoid being noticed by the subjects 
of research――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Aah!? 
The subjects have disappeared!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
We must search for them!! 
Trainer!

I wasn't quite sure what was going on,
but I was worried about her being on her
own, so I decided to follow her…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The ground, it doesn't seem to be 
looking too good today…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
This is due to the rain the day before.
It is my hypothesis that this is ideal
for training in anticipation of poor
track conditions.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But, with Rice's misfortune, something 
might happen…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Though, I seem to recall that dealing
with irregular situations is part of
your training?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ms. Bourbon… You're right, thank you.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Not at all. More importantly, I'm rather 
curious about something.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Uuuugh, the mud is so heavy… Quite the
formidable foe this track condition is
to get even someone like myself stuck!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
However, it's hard to hear what you're 
saying. Especially Ms. Bourbon!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hypothe… saurus?……Irregu… lar? 
A part… a part of your tuna-ing?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps, after training you are going
to a sushi restaurant!? Uuuuu, I must go
there too, so I can do my research while
I'm at it!!
choice_data_list: Those are your two research subjects?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Oya!? 
How did you know that!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Indeed, I'm currently studying those two
as potential future rivals…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It's a big project, so it was necessary
to be careful, and I had to keep it
a secret from even you, Trainer. Now,
then…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Surely, you must be a telepath, Trainer! 
You're a telepathic trainer, aren't you? 
It's a kind of Uma, isn't it!?
choice_data_list: It's not an Uma, or a UMA.
It's not an Uma, or a UMA.

text_block_list.text:
I know what Sakura Bakushin O is 
doing, sneaking around and spying 
on the two of them, but…
choice_data_list: Why are those two your rivals?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Very well, I'll tell you, as class
president. Those two are next year's
most popular Classic class Umas!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
In other words, they're naturally
destined to showdown with me as I
continue down the Bakushin Road!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ms. Rice Shower. She is a small stayer,
but a very good one. She also looks
timid, but she has a competitive spirit.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ms. Mihono Bourbon. She has the speed
to be a sprinter and the stamina to keep
it up.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Both of them are formidable opponents, 
but in my expert opinion, I believe Ms. 
Bourbon to be the best rival.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
After all, her speed is quite the
threat. She'll definitely be competing
with me in the early stages of the race.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
…Say, wait a minute, are you listening
to me!? You're just staring at me with
your mouth wide open!
choice_data_list: I just thought it was a great analysis.

text_block_list.text:
Sakura Bakushin O, who always seems
to have a tendency to act rashly, is
giving a very thoughtful and respectable
analysis…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Naturally! 
After all, I am the class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The analysis of one's rivals should be
done before breakfast―no, before dinner!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
With this kind of research, I'll have no 
problem winning any race, even in 
middle or long distances!

…Better just to keep quiet about the
fact that most important premise is
blatantly incorrect. Ah, right over
there…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Ms. Bakushin O.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hawaa!?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
From the time I arrived at school 
until now, I noticed that I was being 
tracked by Ms. Bakushin-O.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Ms. Rice and I came to the conclusion
that you had some business with us.
We'll listen.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Aaaaahhh―uh!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I am absolutely not!! Researching you
two!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Huh? 
R, researching…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
This is why! You should go ahead and 
please take your sweet time while you 
practice!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Squeaaak!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Ms. Bakushin O! 
If you run too fast…!
(Slip!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Gyaawaaahhh――!?!?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Awawaa…! Ms. Bakushin O is all covered
in mud because Rice called out to her…!

As I helped the fallen Sakura Bakushin
O up, I thought again about how to deal
with her passion for the Bakushin Road…
